page.title: 15TRADE & FARMING
page.content:
There is a rank of small shops on { {WESTBOURNE ROAD}, DOWNEND and{DIBDEN {ROAD}, BLACKHORSE. There is only one shop in the east of the block _ the { {GENERAL STORES}at HENFIELD and there is a {GARDEN CENTRE}on the BADMINTON ROAD.
{FARMING} The area has over a dozen farms in the EAST and NORTH_EAST of the block. We have discovered that at least seven of these farms are still operating as farms. Two others operate as poultry farms and there are two riding stables and one dog kennels. All of there farms are on land that is, or was, used as farm land. The farms at {HENFIELD},{HALLEN}and{ {SERRIDGE}farms all have beef cattle as there main occupation.
